results.content:
So far course was going well. Until some point when nothing works on the code instructor is proposing in video.

He is not replying any question students are posting.

Don't waste your money with an instructor that is not honoring the people who believed in his course.

results.content: It was interesting to learn how all those moving parts came together… I liked the QR Code part. Gave me some new ideas. Will use it in my projects. Thanks a bunch!
